input.sentences: it took us a long time to drive to location .
when we got there the first thing we did was go to the beach .
then we explored all the shops and streets .
there were not many people out .
the cathedral was my favorite building .
output.sentences: As dawn broke over the town, a few motorists were driving to work.
The shops sat empty as the day began.
Slowly, the streets started to fill with people.
With the cathedral clock keeping them all on time.
